items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: "DocuComp is a lightweight and user-friendly tool designed to streamline the management of technical documentation and compliance tasks for developers. With DocuComp, you can efficiently organize, access, and collaborate on documentation, ensuring accuracy and compliance with regulatory requirements.

items.content_html: Rivulex NestJS is a wrapper over Rivulex, a lightweight message broker using Redis Streams. It offers easy plug-in abstractions for NestJS, including a custom transport layer for event-driven communication, publisher, and event trimming, ensuring reliable, at-least-once message delivery.
items.title: raw-leak/nestjs-rivulex: Rivulex NestJS is a wrapper over Rivulex, a lightweight message broker using Redis Streams. It offers easy plug-in abstractions for NestJS, including a custom transport layer for event-driven communication, publisher, and event trimming, ensuring reliable, at-least-once message delivery.
